label: EU Commission
desc: Provides public funding under Horizon Europe.

label: NextGenerationEU
desc: EU Recovery Instrument. Primary source for UNICO (Spain) & RESTART (Italy).

label: 6G-IA
desc: Industry Association. Represents private sector matching funds.

label: Eurescom
desc: Provides administrative support to SNS JU.

label: EDF (Defence Fund)
desc: European Defence Fund. Funding dual-use/military projects like VANTAGE.

label: BMBF (DE)
desc: German Federal Ministry. Total program volume ~€700M.

label: France 2030
desc: French National Strategy. Focused on strategic autonomy.

label: PEPR Networks
desc: Priority Research Program for Future Networks. Co-led by CEA, CNRS, IMT.

label: France 6G
desc: National platform launched by IMT to unite ecosystem & standardization.

label: Spanish Gov (UNICO)
desc: UNICO I+D 6G Program funded by NextGenEU (>€100M).

label: UK Gov
desc: Wireless Infrastructure Strategy. Associated to Horizon Europe (2024).

label: RESTART (Italy)
desc: Italian program for Future Telecoms. €118M budget (PNRR).

label: FNS (Netherlands)
desc: Future Network Services. ~€203M National Growth Fund.

label: FCT (Portugal)
desc: Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia. Public funding agency.

label: NCBR (Poland)
desc: National Centre for Research and Development. Polish funding agency.

label: Polish Presidency '25
desc: EU Council Presidency 2025. Pushing 'Digital Networks Act'.

label: Silicon Austria Labs
desc: Austria's top research center for EBS. Focus on 6G Sensing & Hardware.

label: SERI (Switzerland)
desc: Swiss State Secretariat for Education. Funds Swiss partners in SNS JU.

label: Nokia
desc: Leading Hexa-X, 6G-ANNA. Chair of 6G-IA. Coordinator of SUSTAIN-6G.

label: Ericsson
desc: Tech Manager in Hexa-X. Focus on sustainability.

label: Orange
desc: Major French Operator. Active in PEPR & France 6G. Tech Manager of SUSTAIN-6G.

label: Telefónica
desc: Major operator. Heavily involved in UNICO & 6G-IA.

label: Thales
desc: Security & Space. Key player in French ecosystem.

label: IS-Wireless
desc: Polish pioneer in Open RAN & 6G technologies.

label: Orange PL
desc: Orange Poland. Active innovation arm in Warsaw.

label: LMT (Latvia)
desc: Latvian Mobile Telephone. Leading VANTAGE drone project & 6G-IA member.

label: Altice Labs (PT)
desc: Innovation center in Aveiro. Focus on optical networks & 6G.

label: Swisscom (CH)
desc: Leading Swiss operator. Partner in 6G-XR and 5G-PPP projects.

label: NXP (AT)
desc: Semiconductors & Security Hardware. Key Austrian industry player.

label: WINGS ICT (GR)
desc: Greek SME driving 6G AI & vertical platforms.

label: Telekom Slovenije
desc: Leading Slovenian operator. Advanced 5G SA & innovation pilot.

label: OTE (Greece)
desc: Greek Telecom. Key partner in 6G-PATH pilots.

label: Atos (Eviden)
desc: Digital integration giant. Key partner in SUNRISE-6G federation.

label: 6G-ANNA
desc: German Industrial Lighthouse Project. Led by Nokia.

label: ENABLE-6G
desc: Privacy & Energy Efficiency. Led by IMDEA Networks.

label: SUSTAIN-6G
desc: Sustainability Lighthouse Project. Led by Nokia & Orange.

label: 6G-PATH
desc: Pilots & Trials in Health, Education, Farming & Cities.

label: CEA-Leti
desc: French Sub-THz hardware. Co-director of PEPR.

label: CNRS
desc: French National Centre for Scientific Research.

label: VTT (Finland)
desc: Leading research institute. Key partner in 6G-XR.

label: Vicomtech (Spain)
desc: Applied Research in AI & Visual Computing.
